application_information.description: The application is a comprehensive medical records management system designed to digitize and centralize patient health information.
application_information.purpose: The primary purpose of the application is to improve healthcare efficiency by providing secure and efficient access to patient records and facilitating seamless communication between healthcare professionals and patients.

users_and_roles.description: Doctors are primary users who use the application for diagnosing patients, prescribing treatments, and accessing patient records.
users_and_roles.access_level: Doctors can access patient records including medical history, lab results, treatment plans, and communicate with other healthcare professionals.

users_and_roles.description: Nurses play a crucial role in patient care and use the application to record vital signs, update patient information, and assist in medical procedures under doctor supervision.
users_and_roles.access_level: Nurses can access patient records under their care, vital signs, medication administration records, and communicate with doctors regarding patient status.

users_and_roles.description: Administrative staff members manage administrative tasks, scheduling appointments, handling billing, and ensuring smooth operations of the healthcare facility.
users_and_roles.access_level: Administrative staff can manage appointments, handle billing information, and perform administrative tasks.

users_and_roles.description: Patients are also users of the application, allowing them to access their own medical records, schedule appointments, view prescription history, and communicate with healthcare providers.
users_and_roles.access_level: Patients can access their medical records, appointment scheduling features, prescription history, and communicate securely with doctors or nurses.

users_and_roles.description: The administrator role has elevated privileges to manage user accounts, configure system settings, and ensure data security and compliance within the application.
users_and_roles.access_level: Administrators have full access to user management, system configuration, and ensuring regulatory compliance.
